about_the_game:
Welcome To Eden! Eden is a Utopian city where all things are perfect, simply as they exist. Play as the main character Drakely, as they suddenly arrive at Eden unbeknownst to how they got there. Meet your fellow residents and neighbors of your new home, as you explore this open world city. Take on quests to help your fellow residents, in order to do your part in helping maintain this utopian society. As you progress through the story and as you earn more responsibility in Eden, a mystery begins to unfold, and it is solely up to you to solve what exactly is happening. And just maybe, things have not been exactly as they've seemed all along...

Welcome To Eden Part 1 is set to release this December 2024!

EXPLORE THE OPEN WORLD OF EDEN

Welcome To Eden is a non linear story taking place in the open world city of Eden. Quests can be done in a variety of orders, as you are free to explore from the beginning and set off on this adventure at your own pace.

TAKE YOUR PLACE IN THIS UTOPIAN SOCIETY

Mingle with the fellow occupants, and be the good friendly neighbor that it takes to help maintain the blessing Eden is.

TAKE ON QUESTS IN THIS PSYCOLLOGICAL ADVENTURE

Welcome To Eden is a Narrative and Quest driven game. In this non linear adventure, progress through the story in an order of your choosing, as you uncover the mysteries of Eden.

SIDE QUEST ADVENTURES AND COLLECTIBLES

For those seeking extra adventures and for the completionists out there, take part in side quests and find collectibles throughout the city.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or Intel Core i7-4770K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 470 (4 GB), AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT (4 GB), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB) or NVIDIA GeForce 1050 Ti (4 GB),
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: Welcome To Eden is a narrative driven adventure RPG set in a utopian city, Eden. Take on quests to help your fellow residents, while learning about the more secretive side of Eden in this psychological adventure. And maybe, just maybe, everything isn't as it seems...
